channel.title: Security on Cable Kitten
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Cable Kitten

item.title: My eCPPT Journey
item.description: I decided to move my study into security to give myself more exposure to an area that I enjoy learning. I wasn’t expecting the rabbithole that it’s sent me down. Studying for the eCPPT has opened up a hole new community and it’s been a brilliant year of learning, but more than I was expecting.
